plugins.name: API Retry Patch
plugins.description: Automatically retries failed API requests for transient network errors
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Auto Disable Untrusted URLs
plugins.description: Automatically disables VRChat
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Auto Follow
plugins.description: Automatically sends you invites when followed users join worlds (or requests invites for private instances)
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Auto Invite Manager
plugins.description: Automatic user invitation system with location tracking and custom messages
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Avatar Logger
plugins.description: Logs and submits avatar IDs to various avatar database providers (avtrDB, NSVR, PAW, VRCDB, VRCWB)
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Bio Symbols Patch
plugins.description: Patches replaceBioSymbols function to handle non-string inputs safely
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Bio Updater
plugins.description: Automatic bio updating with user statistics and custom templates
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Context Menu API
plugins.description: Custom context menu management for VRCX dialogs
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Debug Plugin
plugins.description: Debug utilities, IPC logging, global scope search, and console commands for development
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: DevTools Button
plugins.description: Adds a button to the navigation menu to open browser DevTools
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Invisible Players Monitor
plugins.description: Detects and notifies when potentially invisible players are in your instance
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Invite Message API
plugins.description: API for managing and rotating custom invite messages with cooldown tracking
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Logger Tester
plugins.description: Test different VRCX notification and logging methods
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Nav Menu API Test
plugins.description: Test plugin to verify nav-menu-api functionality with extensive debug logging
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Navigation Menu API
plugins.description: API for adding custom navigation menu items to VRCX
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Plugin Manager UI
plugins.description: Visual UI for managing VRCX custom plugins - Equicord inspired
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Registry Overrides
plugins.description: VRChat registry settings management with event-based triggers (disabled by default)
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Self Invite on Blocked Player
plugins.description: Automatically creates a self-invite to a new instance when a blocked player joins your current instance
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Start Game Button
plugins.description: Adds a button to the navigation menu to start VRChat with VRCX settings
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Tag Manager
plugins.description: Custom user tags management with URL-based loading
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Template Plugin
plugins.description: Example plugin demonstrating all available features and lifecycle events
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: User Badge Pipeline Patch
plugins.description: Adds support for user-badge-assigned pipeline events and displays badge notifications
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: VRCX Protocol Links
plugins.description: Adds context menu items to copy VRCX protocol links for users, avatars, worlds, groups, and instances
plugins.author: Bluscream

plugins.name: Yoinker Detector
plugins.description: Automatically checks users against yoinker detection database and applies tags + notifications
plugins.author: Bluscream
